attributes.comment:
To Whom it May Concern,
I believe it is fine to raise the Biometric fees per person/couple as well as the
Immigration Benefit Application/Petition if it is really needed. I would like to
strongly suggest considering lowering the fees for those of us who have to redo our
services within a certain time frame which is out of our control. In my situation,
my husband and I are adopting through The People's Republic of China and, due
to the increasingly long wait time, we are forced to resubmit our petition and
fingerprints. It would be very appreciated if we had a lower fee the second time
around since everything would remain the same for us.
Thank you for your time
Kisha Bishop
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Kisha Bishop
